document_data.name: Hadrogh Prohl
document_data.mainbody: '''Hadrogh Prohl''' was an elderly cane-wielding [[half-drow]] merchant of [[Mantol-Derith]] dealing in slaves.
document_data.History: Hadrogh was approached by [[Xandra Shobalar]] to purchase prey for the [[Blooding]].
document_data.Physical description: Hadrogh had white hair and a weathered face and wore a patch over his left eye.
document_data.Equipment: He carried a wooden cane ornamented with [[gem]]s and gilding, and wore a silk tunic and an embroidered cape with a [[diamond]] neck clasp.
